maqras.text: 37|145|to hamane phenk diya use khule maidaan mein aur vah rogee[1] tha.
37|146|aur uga diya us[1] par lataon ka ek vrksh.
37|147|tatha hamane use rasool banaakar bheja ek laakh, balki adhik kee or.
37|148|to ve eemaan laaye. phir hamane unhen sukh-suvidha pradaan kee ek samay[1] tak.
37|149|to (he nabee!) aap unase prashn karen ki kya aapake paalanahaar ke lie to putriyaan hon aur unake lie putr
37|150|athava kiya hamane paida kiya hai farishton ko naariyaan aur ve us samay upasthit[1] the
37|151|saavadhaan! vaastav mein, ve apane man se banaakar ye baat kah rahe hain.
37|152|ki allaah ne santaan banaee hai aur nishchay ye mithya bhaashee hain.
37|153|kya allaah ne praathamikta dee hai putriyon ko, putron par
37|154|tumhen kya ho gaya hai, tum kaisa nirnay de rahe ho
37|155|to kya tum shiksha grahan nahin karate
37|156|athava tumhaare paas koee pratyaksh pramaan hai
37|157|to apanee pustak lao, yadi tum satyavaadee ho
37|158|aur unhonne bana diya allaah tatha jinnon ke madhy, vansh-sambandh. jabaki jinn svayan jaanate hain ki ve allaah ke samaksh nishchay upasthit kiye[1] jaayenge.
37|159|allaah pavitr hai un gunon se, jinaka ve varnan kar rahe hain.
37|160|parantu, allaah ke shudhd bhakt.
37|161|to nishchay tum tatha tumhaare poojy.
37|162|tum sab kisee ek ko bhee kupath nahin kar sakate.
37|163|usake siva, jo narak mein jhonka jaane vaala hai.
37|164|aur nahin hai ham (farishton) mein se koee, parantu usaka ek niyamit sthaan hai.
37|165|tatha ham hee (aagyaapaalan ke lie) panktivadhd hain.
37|166|aur ham hee tasbeeh (pavitrata gaan) karane vaale hain.
37|167|tatha ve (mushrik) to kaha karate the kih
37|168|yadi hamaare paas koee smrti (pustak) hotee, jo pahale logon mein aaee
37|169|to ham avashy allaah ke shudhd bhakton mein ho jaate.
37|170|(phir jab aa gayee) to unhonne quraan ke saath kufr kar diya, atah, sheeghr hee unhen gyaan ho jaayega.
37|171|aur pahale hee hamaara vachan ho chuka hai apane bheje hue bhakton ke lie.
37|172|ki nishchay unheen kee sahaayata kee jaayegee.
37|173|tatha vaastav mein hamaaree sena hee prabhaavashaalee (vijayee) hone vaalee hai.
37|174|to aap munh pher len unase, kuchh samay tak.
37|175|tatha unhen dekhate rahen. ve bhee sheeghr hee dekh lenge.
37|176|to kya, ve hamaaree yaatana kee sheeghr maang kar rahe hain.
37|177|to jab vah utar aayegee unake maidaanon mein, to bura ho jaayega saavadhaan kiye huon ka savera.
37|178|aur aap munh pher len unase, kuchh samay tak.
37|179|tatha dekhate rahen, antatah ve (bhee) dekh lenge.
37|180|pavitr hai aapaka paalanahaar, gaurav ka svaamee, us baat se, jo ve bana rahe hain.
37|181|tatha salaam hai rasoolon par.
37|182|tatha sabhee prashansa, allaah, sarvalok ke paalanahaar ke lie hai.
38|1|saad. shapath hai shikshaaprad quraan kee
38|2|balki, jo kaafir ho gaye, ve ek garv tatha virodh mein grast hain.
38|3|hamane vinaash kiya hai inase poorv, bahut-se samudaayon ka. to ve pukaarane lage aur nahin hota vah bachane ka samay.
38|4|tatha unhen aashchary hua ki aa gaya unake paas, unheen mense ek sachet karane[1] vaala! aur kah diya kaafiron ne ki ye to bada jhootha jaadoogar hai.
38|5|kya usane bana diya hai sab poojyon ko ek poojy? ye to bade aashchary ka vishay hai.
38|6|tatha chal diye unake pramukh, (ye) kahate hue ki chalo, drdh raho apane poojyon par. is baat ka kuchh aur hee lakshy[1] hai.
38|7|hamane nahin sunee ye baat praacheen dharmon mein, ye to bas managhadat baat hai.
38|8|kya useepar utaaree gaee hai ye shiksha hamaare beech mein se? balki ve sandeh mein hain meree shiksha se. balki unhonne abhee yaatana nahin chakhee hai.
38|9|athava unake paas hain, aapake atyant prabhutvashaalee pradaata paalanahaar kee daya ke kosh
38|10|athava unheen ka hai raajy, aakaashon tatha dharatee ka aur jo kuchh un donon ke madhy hai? to unhen chaahiye ki chadh jaayen (aakaashon mein) rassiyaan taan[1] kar.
38|11|ye ek tuchchh sena hai, yahaan praajit senaon[1] mein se.
38|12|jhuthalaaya inase pahale nooh tatha aad aur shaktivaan firaun kee jaati ne.
38|13|tatha samood aur loot kee jaati evan van ke vaasiyon[1] ne. yahee senaayen hain.
38|14|in sabhee ne jhuthalaaya rasoolon ko, to meree yaatana sidhd ho gayee.
38|15|aur ye nahin prateeksha kar rahe hain, parantu ek karkash dhvani kee jisake lie kuchh bhee der nahin hogee.
38|16|tatha unhonne kaha ki he hamaare paalanahaar! sheeghr pradaan kar de hamaare lie hamaaree (yaatana ka) bhaag haisaab ke din se pahale.
38|17|aap sahan karen usapar, jo ve kah rahe hain tatha yaad karen hamaare bhakt daavood ko, jo atyant shaktishaalee tha. nishchay vah dhyaanamagn tha.
38|18|hamane vashvartee kar diya tha parvaton ko, jo usake saath pavitrata gaan karate the, sandhya tatha praatah.
38|19|tatha pakshiyon ko ekatrit kiye hue, pratyek usake adheen dhyaanamagn rahate the.
38|20|aur hamane drdh kiya usake raajy ko aur hamane pradaan kee use naboovat tatha nirnay shakti.
